title: Gulo Composites makes their extremely light gravel wheels wider &  deeper
content:
Gulo launched their brand with unique, woven carbon fiber spokes on two sets of wheels: Enduro mountain bike, and a lightweight, shallow “SL” gravel set. Now, they’ve added a deeper GGA-38 (Gravel Aero) set, and a wider lightweight GGA-SL (Gravel Adventure) set, giving racers a more capable wheelset no matter their goals. Gulo GGA-SL ultralight

The post Gulo Composites makes their extremely light gravel wheels wider & deeper appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
